title: Museum Schedule Update
description: The museum will be open from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. We encourage visitors to come early to fully enjoy the exhibits.

title: New Exhibit Opening Soon
description: A new historical exhibit titled “Treasures of Bukidnon” will officially open next week. All guests are invited to witness the unveiling.

title: System Maintenance Notice
description: The museum website and attendance system will undergo maintenance on Saturday, 9:00 PM – 11:00 PM. Some features may be temporarily unavailable.

title: Free Admission Day
description: Enjoy FREE admission this coming Friday in celebration of National Heritage Month. Bring your friends and family!
